person.persName: Samuel A. Miller (U.S. Army lieut and captain 1st KY Lt Art)

body.p: U.S. Army lieutenant and captain. Ohio native. Served in the 2nd Minnesota Volunteer Infantry Regiment (U.S.A.) as private from March 6, 1862, to January 1, 1864. Served in the 1st Kentucky Light Artillery Regiment (U.S.A.) as second lieutenant, lieutenant, and captain from January 2, 1864, to August 1, 1865.
